      • Location

        public Location(float xPos,
                float yPos,
                float angle,
                float speed,
                float maxSpeed)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        xPos - Position on X-Axis.
        yPos - Position on Y-Axis
        angle - The angular direction of the circle (0 degrees = Right, as degrees increment the angle rotates counter-clockwise)
        speed - Speed of the point
        maxSpeed - The maximum speed of a point

      • distance

        public float distance(float relXPos,
                      float relYPos)
        Calculates the distance between location and one other point using pythagorean-theorem
        Parameters:
        relXPos - X-Pos of the point
        relYPos - Y-Pos of the point
        Returns:
        Returns the distance btween the location and the point

      • distance

        public float distance(Location location)
        Overloaded distance method, does the same but takes a location as in-parameter (instead of a point)
        Parameters:
        location - The location to which distance is to be calculated to
        Returns:
        Returns the distance between this location and another location.
